recipes.web_iis::do_demo_deploy: Deploys demo web app from cookbook-relative zipped source to wwwroot under IIS
recipes.web_iis::do_simple_app_deploy: Deploys all web app from zipped source to wwwroot under IIS

long_description:
= DESCRIPTION:

Configures an IIS Web Server.

= REQUIREMENTS:

* Currently only works with an EBS Volume attached to server which is used as a web application source directory.

= ATTRIBUTES: 

See metadata.rb

= USAGE:

Designed to be run within a RightScale ServerTemplate with the following run order:

Boot Scripts
  * do_demo_deploy - Deploys an initial image of a demo web application to wwwroot.

Operational Scripts
  * do_simple_app_deploy - Deploys all web app from zipped source to wwwroot under IIS from an EBS volume.
name: web_iis

web_iis\/deploy\/web_app_src_zips.description: The path to the directory containing one or more web application source .zip file(s).
